name: CoronaShrek 2
description:
Hi, this is a lost project i had there in a google drive. I just though that i can show it to the world. I mean its honestly cringy but its one of my first projects and im "proud" of it. Enjoy it.

Also, theres even a dumb trailer i made for class. Aaaaand an android version i did in 30 minutes, full of bugs. Enjoy them uwu

Behance post i did back in the day <3:

https://www.behance.net/gallery/100311013/CoronaShrek-2-3rd-Project

ALSO i tested ads in the android release, just disable wifi if you dont wanna see them.
